title: Poss Varus bug?
body:
Dear rito

I was just playing as Varus in legend of the poro king (which is AMAZING, I might add), and in the last few minutes of the game my q would not go off. 

It wasn't greyed out, it didn't do that chirrup thing and say 'not available!', I wasn't silenced, I didn't change my key bindings. It just completely ignored me each time I pressed it. 

Had been working fine all game before that, and the Varus on the other team still had his working at the end. 

I just have no idea why this might have been, and it might pay to have a little look into it? I'm no genius so it may have been something obvious, but I've never seen an ability just completely not respond like that. Usually there is an obvious reason, you know? Ty anyway

replies.body:
Does sound like a weird glitch, but not impossible, consider the other bugs that have been happening lately.

Just, go into Notepad and press Q repeatedly, just to make sure it isn't your keyboard being unresponsive.
